
```{r}
#| include: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false

library(dplyr)
library(knitr)

cleaned_data <- read_csv("outputs/cleaned_data.csv")

# count the number of rows in each department
department_counts <- cleaned_data %>% 
  group_by(Department) %>% 
  summarize(count = n()) %>% 
  arrange(desc(count))

# create a formatted table
kable(department_counts, 
      caption = "Number of Artworks by Department"
      ) %>%
  kable_styling(latex_options = "HOLD_position", font_size = 10)

# print the result
print(department_counts)

```
